attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the people in this country are told that they HAVE a minimum wage which they MUST be paid, however why not you lot at the top, how can there be such obscene salaries on the football pitch and TV "celebs" when others can't afford to go out for a pint or keep their homes warm, anything OVER £75k shoud have an instant 99% tax, plus removal of child benefits, this is a two sided country and needs levelling, if they don't like it then go, we can survive on people earning no more than £75k, I am sure anybody on low pay would read the news for a meagre £75k or add up numbers on Countdown!!
